name: Cosmic Bustle
description:
Cosmic Bustle - arcade (but sometimes not very) space shooter.

It was created to brighten up your existence :)

- 4 levels available for passing. Each is divided into 10 waves.

- Use your reaction to quickly neutralize the danger.

- Maneuver in endless spaces of space.

- Earn gold and buy upgrades.

- Defeat bosses at the end of the level.

Enjoy!

Can you complete all four levels?
